Description of incident: Beachwood-Lakewood Plastic Surgery and Dr. Stevem A. Golman, notified patients of a data breach when their office in the Parkway Medical complex were burglarized. The theives stole computer hardware that inlcuded patient information that included names and limited medical information.The medical practice is offering you one year of credit monitoring at no cost. This  service is provided by All Clear ID.If you have any questions or would like to enroll in the credit monitoring service, call 1-877-615-3745.
